cab.content: nnt Ur Property ofGoloxie] dories73OPERATIONS.SECRETFrom General Plumer, Italy.To C.I.G.S., War Office.Repeated G.H.Q., France.Despatched 1.46 p.m. 15.12,17. Received 3.15 p.m, 15.12.17.0. 122 December 15th.Yesterday the enemy1 s artillery Vrere very active against the northern sector. In the late afternoon the Italians v/ere forced to drav; back from Col Berretta which' is an important point. The Italian counter-attack.failed but they propose making another counter-attack to-day. Very persistent and continuous enemy attacks have taken place and their artixlery bombardment has undoubtedly been severe, but the Italian command are not discouraged. This morning there is a thick fog and indications of snov,r.
